stimulusHtml: Blocks A and B, of masses mA and mB, are at rest on a frictionless surface, as shown above, with block A fixed to the table. Block C of mass mC is suspended by a string that is tied to block B over an ideal pulley. Which of the following gives the magnitude of the force exerted by block A on block B ?
choicesHtml: m A   m C m A + m B   g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4461@

m B   m C m A + m B   g MathType@MTEF@5@5@@4462@
